title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. g. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The buttons should be of an appropriate size. b. When the dialog comes up, the first table entry should be selected. c. The move buttons should be disabled when no table entry is selected. d. The preview should be able to display the full parameter name, even if it is very long. f. The dialog should have a size that accommodates methods with many parameters.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the modify parameters dialog. 2. Change the name of a parameter to something very long. 3. Observe that the preview of the parameter name is cut off.
